sentences.en: Help Rebecca refurbish a rundown castle and turn it into a pizza palace!
sentences.cn: 帮助丽贝卡再磨光减少城堡并且把它变成薄饼宫殿!

sentences.en: Some manufacturers refurbish products themselves and others use qualified third party partners.
sentences.cn: 一些生产厂家翻新产品本身和其他人使用合格的第三方合作伙伴.

sentences.en: The same applies to renovations and plans to refurbish, make repairs, or redecorate.
sentences.cn: 同样,如果打算装修 、 修理 、 整理等事务,最好也放到这两个时期.

sentences.en: We have spent money on refurbishing the offices.
sentences.cn: 我们已在这些办公室的翻新上花了钱。

trans.tran_en: To refurbish a building or room means to clean it and decorate it and make it more attractive or better equipped
